channel.title: An issue ive noticed
channel.description:
Well recently ive been wondering each section, and ive noticed that when I click home that the posts are starting to slow down.
Each post takes atleast 1 hour.
I don't know but are you guys getting sick of Private Servers.
Because most of the posts are getting slower and slower.
A couple of months ago posts swamm in, but now are kind of tightening up.
Any suggestions?

item.title: An issue ive noticed
item.dc:creator: @ephemeral ephemeral
item.description:
@ephemeral wrote:

It’s just a phase; the activity in the forums will pick up again, soon.

Read full topic

item.title: An issue ive noticed
item.dc:creator: @tobias222 tobias222
item.description:
@tobias222 wrote:

I wouldn’t worry about this, I’ve been here for a few years now and although there are better sites, I have to say the moderators have came a long way from being pricks, mabye theyre just different people I don’t know.

Read full topic

item.title: An issue ive noticed
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

But atm, there’s a craze in the help topics; Generally in the summer, that goes down.

Read full topic

item.title: An issue ive noticed
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Spring/Summer 2007 was proabably the most active.

Its better to have a smaller community because it is easier to moderate therefore everything looks nice. Furthermore, when theres less members you know who to trust and you are not treated like an outsider.(like shitty sites filed with trolls; 4chan for example)

Read full topic

item.title: An issue ive noticed
item.dc:creator: @Scarecrows Scarecrows
item.description:
@Scarecrows wrote:

I don’t see any problem with the influx of new members. As for post amount each day, I would think it’s because of there not being much to post about on this side of the forum, although that was one of the reasons why the general discussion board was created.

Read full topic

item.title: An issue ive noticed
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

Longer than his clean underwear.

Read full topic

item.title: An issue ive noticed
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:3, topic:279863”]Eventually it will end.

Untill then everyone should make the most of it.[/quote]

Do you realize how long these forums have been around? We’ve faced worse times.

Read full topic

item.title: An issue ive noticed
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Eventually it will end.

Untill then everyone should make the most of it.

Read full topic

item.title: An issue ive noticed
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Not that it matters, but activity on moparscape is constantly fluctuating, around June it will become very active again and will stay that way until the end of summer break then will go back down again. Always a never ending process.

Read full topic
